articles.author: SARAH EL DEEB, ZEINA KARAM
articles.title: An Israeli airstrike killed journalists covering the war in Lebanon as they slept - The Associated Press
articles.description: An Israeli airstrike that hit a guesthouse in southeast Lebanon has killed three journalists who were covering the Israel-Hezbollah war. Those killed were camera operator Ghassan Najjar and broadcast technician Mohammed Rida of the Beirut-based pan-Arab Al-Ma…
articles.content: BEIRUT (AP) An Israeli airstrike killed three journalists as they slept at a guesthouse in southeast Lebanon at dawn Friday, in one of the deadliest attacks on the media since hostilities broke out a… [+7364 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: What I learned from 3 years of running Windows 11 on “unsupported” PCs - Ars Technica
articles.description: When your old PC goes over the Windows 10 update cliff, can Windows 11 save it?
